# SEQ21 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 21 focuses on the most important areas and rooms (in a house)

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl143, apl144, apl145, apl146, apl147, apl148, apl149, apl150, apl151

## Emergent Phenomena
Houses with clearly defined main areas that support family life and privacy

## Overview
This sequence contains 9 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
